CommandTexts.CommandText: SELECT OBJECT_NAME AS "Name", CASE WHEN OBJECT_TYPE='VIEW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "IsView", B.COMMENTS AS "Comments" FROM USER_OBJECTS a LEFT JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS B ON a.OBJECT_NAME=b.TABLE_NAME WHERE TEMPORARY='N' AND OBJECT_TYPE IN('TABLE', 'VIEW') ORDER BY OBJECT_NAME ASC
